name: Gameboy Advance Video Crash Bandicoot Commercial Compilations
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Crash Bandicoot Commercial Compilations
description:
Remember the Classic 90´s video game commercials that there are mega extreme and full of fun with Crash Bandicoot dude on the suit going to challange ''Mario'' on Nintendo headquarters?

Remember Crash dance that it was wild in Japan?

Now you had is the Crash Bandicoot Commercial Compilations on english and japanese version in gameboy advance file to watch.

Here is a nice secret on En Commercial:Did you know on Crash Twinsanity for nintendo power hour add Steve-O and Chris Ponie from the old Jackass MTV Show AKA WildBoys for making the only stunts for this Commercial?

If you wanna see more crash cutscenes and stuff,check my other projects that i made on gameboy advance video files.

Hope you like it :like it,share it with your friends and Enjoy!
